title: The Richard Sherman Podcast - Reaction to 49ers & Packers losing, Russell Wilson vs. Seahawks preview
itunes:title: The Richard Sherman Podcast - Reaction to 49ers & Packers losing, Russell Wilson vs. Seahawks preview
description:
Richard Sherman reacts to the biggest games and storylines from NFL Week 1. Richard gives his takes on Trey Lance's debut, Joe Burrows awful game vs the Steelers & Patrick Mahomes' performance without Tyreek Hill. Will Aaron Rodgers & the Green Bay Packers miss the playoffs after losing to the Minnesota Vikings? Later he discusses why the Ravens need to pay Lamar Jackson and why Baker Mayfield isn't the answer for the Carolina Panthers. He also previews the Monday Night Football game between Russell Wilson & the Denver Broncos vs the Seattle Seahawks. Lastly he gives his takes from Bills-Rams and who names the most disappointing players from Week 1. #volume #herd #colincowherd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
